nodes.text: Falleen Lady was a casino and pleasure house on Nar Shaddaa, owned by the Hutt Kurka. Known for its pheromone-enhanced hostesses, the casino ferried in customers through shuttles, preventing larger starships from coming within weapons range.

Able to house thousands of sentients, it included luxury rooms for the rich guests, living quarters for the staff and barracks for the security. Since the security didn't allow the guests to bear weapons, it was also a popular meeting place.
